document.title: The Database Industry Today: Some Vendorsâ€™ Perspectives

keywords.keyword: American Society for Information Science & Technology

document.abstract: Discusses developments in the database industry in the U.S. as of February 1, 1984. Vendors accounting for major revenue and usage in the online searching business; Survey conducted by Downloading Subcommittee of the Information Industry Association; Print version of Management Contents database by Gale Research Inc.; Database service started by Knowledge Industry Publications Inc. and the American Society for Information Science.
document.publication-title: School of Information Sciences -- Faculty Publications and Other Works
